title: The Steam-Driven Boy and Other Strangers
description: The Steam-Driven Boy is John Sladek's first collection of brilliant, eccentric, darkly satirical and downright weird science fiction stories. As a bonus it includes his parodies of SF authors, uproariously spoofing Asimov (and the Laws of Robotics), Ballard, Bradbury, Dick, Poe, Cordwainer Smith, and more.Further details may be found at http://www.isfdb.org/cgi-bin/pl.cgi?4...
author: John Sladek
